essentials.title: üåü Essential Shortcuts
essentials.description: The ones you MUST learn from day 1

descriptions.commandPalette: Opens a search bar with ALL available commands in VS Code
descriptions.quickOpen: Search for any file in your project by typing part of its name
descriptions.save: Saves the changes in the file you're working on
descriptions.saveAll: Saves the changes in all the files you have open
descriptions.find: Searches for a word or text within the current file
descriptions.replace: Searches for text and replaces it with something else in the file
descriptions.commentLine: Turns lines of code into comments (or back) so they won't execute
descriptions.commentBlock: Comments out multiple selected lines at once as a block
descriptions.undo: Undoes the last change you made (goes back)
descriptions.redo: Redoes what you just undid (goes forward)
descriptions.terminal: Shows or hides the command console integrated in VS Code
descriptions.cutLine: Cuts the entire line where the cursor is (even if you haven't selected it)
descriptions.copyLine: Copies the entire line where the cursor is (even if you haven't selected it)
descriptions.moveLine: Moves the current line up or down without copy and paste
descriptions.copyLineUpDown: Duplicates the current line above or below where it is
descriptions.deleteLine: Completely deletes the line where the cursor is
descriptions.insertLineBelow: Creates a new empty line below without moving the cursor
descriptions.insertLineAbove: Creates a new empty line above without moving the cursor
descriptions.jumpToBracket: Jumps to the matching opening or closing parenthesis/bracket/brace
descriptions.indent: Moves code to the right (indent) or left (outdent)
descriptions.goToLineStart: Moves the cursor to the beginning or end of the current line
descriptions.goToFileStart: Takes the cursor directly to the start of the file
descriptions.goToFileEnd: Takes the cursor directly to the end of the file
descriptions.foldRegion: Hides (collapses) a code block to see less on screen
descriptions.unfoldRegion: Shows (expands) a code block that was hidden
descriptions.foldAll: Hides all code blocks in the file (compressed view)
descriptions.unfoldAll: Shows all code blocks in the file (expanded view)
descriptions.blockComment: Creates block comments with /* */ to comment multiple lines
descriptions.toggleWordWrap: Turns automatic line wrapping on or off for long lines
descriptions.goToLine: Opens a box to jump directly to a specific line number
descriptions.goToFile: Searches for and opens any file in the project quickly
descriptions.goToSymbol: Lists all functions, classes, and variables in the current file
descriptions.showAllSymbols: Searches for functions, classes, and variables across the entire project
descriptions.problemsPanel: Opens the panel where all errors and warnings are displayed
descriptions.nextError: Jumps directly to the next error or warning in the code
descriptions.previousError: Goes back to the previous error or warning
descriptions.navigateHistory: Shows the history of files you've recently edited
descriptions.goBackForward: Navigates backward or forward through the places you've edited
descriptions.toggleTabFocus: Changes whether the Tab key moves focus or inserts spaces
descriptions.findInFile: Searches for specific text within the current file
descriptions.replaceInFile: Searches for and replaces text in the current file
descriptions.findNext: Jumps to the next occurrence of what you're searching for
descriptions.findPrevious: Goes back to the previous occurrence of what you're searching for
descriptions.selectAllMatches: Selects all occurrences of the searched text
descriptions.addSelection: Adds the next match to your selection (multi-cursor)
descriptions.skipSelection: Skips one match and selects the next one
descriptions.findInFiles: Searches for text in ALL files in the project
descriptions.replaceInFiles: Replaces text in ALL files in the project
descriptions.caseSensitive: Distinguishes between uppercase and lowercase when searching
descriptions.wholeWord: Searches only for complete words (not within other words)
descriptions.regex: Enables searching with advanced patterns (regular expressions)
descriptions.insertCursor: Places an additional cursor where you click (to edit in multiple places)
descriptions.insertCursorUpDown: Adds a cursor on the line above or below
descriptions.undoCursor: Removes the last additional cursor you added
descriptions.cursorAtLineEnd: Places a cursor at the end of each line you've selected
descriptions.selectLine: Selects the entire line where the cursor is
descriptions.selectAllOccurrences: Places cursors at all locations where your selection appears
descriptions.selectAllInstances: Selects all words that match the one under the cursor
descriptions.expandSelection: Expands your selection intelligently (word ‚Üí line ‚Üí block)
descriptions.shrinkSelection: Shrinks your selection to the previous size
descriptions.columnSelectionMouse: Selects text in a rectangular shape using the mouse
descriptions.columnSelectionKeyboard: Selects text in a rectangular shape using the keyboard
descriptions.triggerParameterHints: Shows information about a function's parameters
descriptions.formatDocument: Formats and organizes all code in the file automatically
descriptions.formatSelection: Formats only the code you've selected
descriptions.goToDefinition: Jumps to where the function or variable was originally defined
descriptions.peekDefinition: Shows the definition in a floating window without changing files
descriptions.openDefinitionSide: Opens the definition in a side editor (split view)
descriptions.quickFix: Shows automatic solutions for errors or code improvements
descriptions.showReferences: Shows all places where a function or variable is used
descriptions.renameSymbol: Changes the name of a variable/function throughout the entire project at once
descriptions.trimTrailingWhitespace: Removes unnecessary spaces at the end of each line
descriptions.changeLanguage: Changes the programming language of the file (JS, Python, etc.)
descriptions.splitEditor: Splits the screen in two to view two files at the same time
descriptions.focusEditorGroup: Switches focus between different split editor groups
descriptions.moveEditor: Moves the current tab left or right
descriptions.moveEditorGroupPosition: Moves an entire editor group to another position
descriptions.openFile: Opens the dialog to search for and open a file
descriptions.saveFile: Saves the file you're working on
descriptions.saveAs: Saves the file with a different name or in another location
descriptions.saveAllFiles: Saves all open files at once
descriptions.closeAll: Closes all files you have open
descriptions.reopenClosed: Reopens the last tab you closed
descriptions.keepPreview: Keeps the file open (won't close when opening another)
descriptions.openNext: Switches to the next open tab
descriptions.copyPath: Copies the file's full path to the clipboard
descriptions.revealInExplorer: Shows the file in the system's file explorer
descriptions.showInNewWindow: Opens the file in a new VS Code window
descriptions.fullScreen: Turns full screen mode on or off
descriptions.zoomIn: Increases the size of text and interface
descriptions.zoomOut: Decreases the size of text and interface
descriptions.toggleSidebar: Shows or hides the left sidebar
descriptions.showExplorer: Opens the project's file explorer panel
descriptions.showDebug: Opens the debugging panel to find errors
descriptions.showExtensions: Opens the panel to install VS Code extensions
descriptions.showReplaceInFiles: Opens the panel to replace text in multiple files
descriptions.toggleSearchDetails: Shows or hides advanced search options
descriptions.showOutput: Opens the panel where system messages are displayed
descriptions.markdownPreview: Shows how the Markdown file will look formatted
descriptions.markdownPreviewSide: Shows Markdown preview in a side panel
descriptions.zenMode: Enables focus mode (full screen without distractions)
descriptions.toggleBreakpoint: Adds or removes a breakpoint to debug the code
descriptions.startContinue: Starts debugging or continues to the next breakpoint
descriptions.stepInto: Steps into the function to see what it does line by line
descriptions.stepOut: Steps out of the current function and returns to the previous level
descriptions.stepOver: Executes the next line without entering any functions it calls
descriptions.showHover: Shows additional information when hovering the cursor over code
descriptions.showTerminal: Opens or closes the integrated terminal (command console)
descriptions.copySelection: Copies the text you've selected in the terminal
descriptions.paste: Pastes the text you have copied to the clipboard (where the cursor is)
descriptions.scrollPage: Scrolls the terminal one full page up or down
descriptions.goToTopBottom: Jumps to the beginning or end of the terminal content
descriptions.keyboardShortcuts: Opens the list of all keyboard shortcuts (you can customize them)
descriptions.outdent: Reduces line indentation (moves code to the left)
descriptions.goToLineEnd: Moves the cursor to the end of the current line
descriptions.goBack: Returns to the previous location where you were editing
descriptions.goForward: Advances to the next location in the editing history
descriptions.navigateEditorGroup: Switches focus between editors when you have a split screen
descriptions.openRecent: Shows files and projects you've recently opened
descriptions.toggleCaseSensitive: Turns case sensitivity on or off for searches
descriptions.toggleRegex: Turns the use of regular expressions in searches on or off
descriptions.toggleWholeWord: Turns whole word matching in searches on or off
descriptions.columnSelection: Selects text in a vertical column shape (box mode)
descriptions.goToImplementation: Jumps to where an interface or method is actually implemented
descriptions.closeOthers: Closes all tabs except the current one
descriptions.resetZoom: Resets zoom to the default size
descriptions.togglePanel: Shows or hides the bottom panel (terminal, problems, etc.)
descriptions.moveSidebarRight: Moves the sidebar to the right or left side
descriptions.restart: Restarts the debugging session from the beginning
descriptions.showDebugConsole: Opens the debug console to see debug messages
descriptions.clearTerminal: Clears all visible content in the terminal
descriptions.focusTerminal: Activates the terminal panel so you can type in it

practice.title: Practice Mode
practice.subtitle: Test your keyboard shortcut knowledge
practice.step1: You'll see a VS Code action
practice.question: What is the shortcut for:
practice.selectOSFirst: Please select your operating system first
practice.betaNotice: This section is in beta. Please report any issues to Miguel Toyas Pernichi via Slack or on GitHub under the username

descriptions.init: Creates a .git folder to start using Git in your project
descriptions.clone: Downloads a complete copy of a repository from GitHub to your computer
descriptions.status: Shows which files you've modified, added, or deleted
descriptions.diff: Shows exactly which lines you've changed in your files
descriptions.add: Prepares a specific file to include in the next commit
descriptions.addAll: Prepares ALL modified files for the next commit
descriptions.commit: Saves the staged changes with a message explaining what you did
descriptions.commitAll: Stages and saves all changes in one step (shortcut)
descriptions.log: Shows the complete history of all commits made
descriptions.logOneline: Shows commit history in compact format (one line per commit)
descriptions.remote: Lists the connected remote repositories (usually GitHub)
descriptions.remoteAdd: Connects your local project with a remote repository on GitHub
descriptions.fetch: Downloads changes from the remote repository without applying them yet
descriptions.pull: Downloads and automatically applies changes from the remote repository
descriptions.push: Uploads your local commits to the remote repository (GitHub)
descriptions.pushUpstream: Pushes your branch for the first time and connects it to the remote
descriptions.pushForce: Forces pushing changes by overwriting the remote history (dangerous!)
descriptions.branch: Shows all local branches (current one appears with an asterisk)
descriptions.branchRemote: Shows all branches that exist in the remote repository
descriptions.branchCreate: Creates a new branch to work on a separate feature
descriptions.checkout: Switches to another branch to work on it
descriptions.switch: Switches to another branch (more modern and clearer than checkout)
descriptions.checkoutCreate: Creates a new branch and switches to it automatically
descriptions.switchCreate: Creates a new branch and switches to it (modern version)
descriptions.branchRename: Changes the name of the current branch
descriptions.branchDelete: Deletes a branch you no longer need (only if merged)
descriptions.branchDeleteForce: Forces deletion of a branch even if not merged
descriptions.branchDeleteRemote: Deletes a branch from the remote repository (GitHub)
descriptions.merge: Combines changes from another branch (e.g., main) with the current branch
descriptions.mergeAbort: Cancels a merge that has conflicts and returns to the previous state
descriptions.branchMerged: Shows which branches have already been merged with the current one
descriptions.stash: Temporarily saves your changes without committing (useful for switching branches)
descriptions.stashSave: Temporarily saves changes with a descriptive message
descriptions.stashList: Shows all the changes you've temporarily saved
descriptions.stashApply: Retrieves the last saved changes without removing them from the stash
descriptions.stashPop: Retrieves and removes the last saved changes from the stash
descriptions.stashApplyIndex: Retrieves a specific stash by its number
descriptions.stashDrop: Deletes a specific stash you no longer need
descriptions.restore: Discards changes in a file and returns to the last saved version
descriptions.restoreStaged: Removes a file from the staging area (unstage) without losing changes
descriptions.resetSoft: Undoes the last commit but keeps the changes in your files
descriptions.resetHard: Undoes the last commit and DELETES all changes (be careful!)
descriptions.revert: Creates a new commit that undoes the changes from a previous commit
descriptions.resetToCommit: Returns your project to a specific commit from the past
descriptions.diffBranches: Compares the differences between two branches
descriptions.blame: Shows who wrote each line of the file and when
descriptions.clean: Removes untracked files (that Git is not following)
descriptions.tag: Shows all tags (versions marked as v1.0, v2.0, etc.)
descriptions.tagCreate: Creates an annotated tag to mark an important version
descriptions.cherryPick: Brings a specific commit from another branch to the current branch
descriptions.rebase: Reorganizes commits by moving your branch on top of another (alternative to merge)

workflow.title: Recommended Workflow
workflow.step1: Switch to main (primary branch) and pull the latest changes from remote
workflow.step2: Create a new branch from main for your feature
workflow.step3: Stage and save your changes with a descriptive message
workflow.step4: Bring changes from main into your branch to keep it synced
workflow.step5: Push your new branch to the remote repository for the first time
workflow.step6: Create Pull Request on GitHub to have your changes reviewed
workflow.step7: After merge (delete branch on GitHub first): update main and clean up local branch

hero.subtitle: A collection of keyboard shortcuts and Git commands for Windows and Mac

shortcuts.title: 120+ VS Code Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Complete collection of keyboard shortcuts for Windows and Mac, ranked by relevance

git.title: 51 Git Commands
git.description: Essential Git commands organized by category

practice.description: Test your knowledge with practice mode
